verses.verse: Moreover, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to it, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> And I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and a <S%H4923>waste.<s%>
"I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> And you will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> and have <S%H5064>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H7093>end,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will <S%H6213>give<s%> you <S%H6213>over<s%> to <S%H1818>bloodshed,<s%> and <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you; <S%H518>since<s%> you have not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>bloodshed,<s%> therefore <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you.

"And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> a <S%H8077>waste<s%> and a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from it the one who <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> and <S%H7725>returns.<s%>

"And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> its <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with its <S%H2491>slain;<s%> on your <S%H1389>hills<s%> and in your <S%H1516>valleys<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H650>ravines<s%> those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

"I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> will not be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%> will be mine, and we will <S%H3423>possess<s%> them,' although the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H8033>there,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will <S%H6213>deal<s%> [with you] according to your <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to your <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of your <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against them; so I will <S%H3045>make<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> among them <S%H9201>when<s%> I <S%H8199>judge<s%> you.

"Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H9308>revilings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'They are <S%H8074>laid<s%> <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> they are <S%H5414>given<s%> to us for <S%H402>food.<s%>'

"And you have <S%H1431>spoken<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H1431>arrogantly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me; I have <S%H8085>heard.<s%>"
<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "As <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices,<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

"As you <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> over the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> it was <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to you. You will be a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> O <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it. Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"'
